import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect'; import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors'; import './checkout.styles.scss' function Checkout({cartItems, total}) { return (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{cartItems.map(cartItem => cartItem.name)}
TOTAL : ${total}
) } const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Checkout)
